mapper.insert: insert into oa_sys.changedepartmentbyteacher(uid, releaseUid, departmentUid, changeReason, nextUid) values (#{uid}, #{releaseUid}, #{departmentUid}, #{changeReason}, #{nextUid})
mapper.select: select count(1) from oa_sys.changedepartmentbyteacher where releaseUid = #{releaseUid} and status = 0 order by update_time desc limit 1

select uid, departmentUid, changeReason, status, count, nextUid, reject_reason, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.changedepartmentbyteacher where releaseUid = #{releaseUid} and status >= 0 order by create_time desc
select uid, releaseUid, departmentUid, changeReason, status, count, nextUid, reject_reason, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.changedepartmentbyteacher where uid = #{uid}
select uid, releaseUid, departmentUid, changeReason, status, count, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.changedepartmentbyteacher where status = 0 and nextUid = #{nextUid} order by create_time desc
mapper.update: update oa_sys.changedepartmentbyteacher set status = 2, reject_reason = #{reject_reason}, nextUid = null where uid = #{uid}
